content: for sale in any form through any venue including but not limited to photocopying other electrical or mechanical means recording or any other information storage and/or retrieval system without prior written consent of the designer you may sell your finished project as long as it is not being mass produced if posting a picture online or in any advertising form of your project credit to on hooks and needles http //on-hooks-and-needles blogspot com would be appreciated all violations of this copyright are punishable by law including fines and/or imprisonment mouth refer to photo 2 with yellow arrows and corresponding letters this is a surface embellishment create a slip knot with the black yarn and hold the slip knot on the back wrong side of the coaster with right side facing insert hook where you want the mouth to begin on the third round d pull loop of slip knot through to right side insert hook in space of next double_crochet of the round e yarn over on wrong side pull loop through to right side andthrough the slip knot loop on your hook insert hook in space of next double_crochet of the round yarn over on wrong size pull though to right side and pull through loop on the hook essentially you re chain stitching through the coaster to embroider the mouth continue along the third round until mouth is the size you want fasten_off d e photo 2 finishing weave in all ends block if necessary add frosty cold beverage and enjoy copyright information this pattern is for the personal use of the buyer only no copies and no forms of distribution are allowed you may not in any form reproduce transmit or distribute this pattern whatsoever this encompasses any part of the pattern itself including but not limited to images diagrams and text without prior written consent of the designer purchasing the pattern does not remove the copyright protection of the pattern you may print out this pattern for your own personal use but you cannot distribute it whether for free or for sale in any form through any venue including but not limited to photocopying other electrical or mechanical means recording or any other information storage and/or retrieval system without prior written consent of the designer you may sell your finished project as long as it is not being mass produced if posting a picture online or in any advertising form of your project credit to on hooks
